00014 
00015 #include <stdio.h>
00016 #include <stdlib.h>
00017 #include "Lgm/Lgm_MagModelInfo.h"
00018 
00019 
00020 
00021 int Lgm_TraceToMinRdotB( Lgm_Vector *u, Lgm_Vector *v, double tol, Lgm_MagModelInfo *Info ) {
00022 
00023     Lgm_Vector  u_scale;
00024     double      Htry, Hdid, Hnext, Hmin, Hmax, s, sgn, sgn0;
00025     double      Sa, Sb, B, f, r2, z2, r3, L, R, hhh;
00026     Lgm_Vector  Btmp;
00027     Lgm_Vector  Pa, Pb, P;
00028     int         done, reset=TRUE, bracketed=FALSE;
00029 
00030     Pb.x = Pb.y = Pb.z = 0.0;
00031 
00032 
00033     Hmax = 20.0;
00034     Hmin = 0.01;
00035     u_scale.x =  100.0;  u_scale.y = 100.0; u_scale.z = 100.0;
00036 
00037 
00038     /* 
00039      *  Set the start point, Pa and |B(Pa)|;
00040      */
00041     Pa   = *u;
00042     Info->Bfield( &Pa, &Btmp, Info );
00043     B    = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00044     f    = Lgm_DotProduct( &Pa, &Btmp ) / B;
00045     Sa   = 0.0;
00046     sgn0 = ( f  < 0.0 ) ? -1.0 : 1.0;
00047 
00048 
00049 
00050 
00051     /*
00052      *  Choose a good step size to try.
00053      */
00054     Lgm_Convert_Coords( &Pa, &P, GSM_TO_SM, Info->c );
00055     R  = Lgm_Magnitude( &Pa );
00056     r2 = R*R;
00057     z2 = P.z*P.z;
00058     L  = 9e99;
00059     if ( fabs( r2 - z2 ) < 1e-2 ) {
00060 
00061         /*
00062          *  High  L
00063          */
00064         Htry = 10.0;
00065 
00066     } else {
00067 
00068         r3   = r2*R;
00069         L    = r3 / (r2 - z2);
00070         Htry = ( L < 4.5 ) ? 1.165*L : 4.5;
00071 
00072     }
00073 
00074     if ( Htry < 1e-4 ) Htry = 0.001;
00075 
00076 
00077 
00078     /* 
00079      *   Now, bracket minimum. And do a bisection search for the minimum.
00080      */
00081     done = FALSE;
00082     sgn  = sgn0;
00083     P    = Pa;
00084     Sb   = -9e99;
00085     while ( !done ) {
00086 
00087         Lgm_MagStep( &P, &u_scale, Htry, &Hdid, &Hnext, 1.0e-7, sgn, &s, &reset, Info->Bfield, Info );
00088         Info->Bfield( &P, &Btmp, Info );
00089         B = Lgm_Magnitude( &Btmp );
00090         R = Lgm_Magnitude( &P );
00091 
00092         f = Lgm_DotProduct( &P, &Btmp ) / B;
00093 
00094     if ( fabs( Sb - Sa ) < tol ){
00095 
00096         done = TRUE;
00097 
00098     } else if ( -f*sgn0 < 0 ){
00099 
00100         Pa    = P;
00101         Sa   += Hdid;
00102         sgn   = sgn0;
00103         if ( bracketed ) {
00104         Htry = fabs( Sb - Sa )/2.0;
00105         } else if ( L < 4.5 ) {
00106         hhh = 1.165*L+1.0 - R + 1.0;
00107         if ( hhh > 1e-4 ) Htry = hhh;
00108 Htry = (R-1.0)/2.0;
00109 
00110         }
00111         /*
00112 printf("A: Sa, Sb, P = %g %g    (%g, %g, %g)   Htry = %f\n", Sa, Sb, P.x, P.y, P.z, Htry);
00113 */
00114 
00115     } else {
00116 
00117         Pb  = P;
00118         if ( bracketed ) Sb += sgn*sgn0*Hdid;
00119         else         Sb  = Sa + Hdid;
00120         
00121         bracketed = TRUE;
00122         sgn  = -sgn0;
00123         Htry = fabs( Sb - Sa )/2.0;
00124         /*
00125 printf("B: Sa, Sb, P = %g %g    (%g, %g, %g)   Htry = %f\n", Sa, Sb, P.x, P.y, P.z, Htry);
00126 */
00127 
00128     }
00129 
00130     }
00131 
00132 
00133 
00134 
00135     /*
00136      *  Take location of the Min-B surface to be Pb.
00137      */
00138     *v = Pb;
00139 
00140 
00141 
00142     return( 1 );
00143 
00144 }
00145 
00146 /*
00147  *   $id$
00148  */
